00039                 return Mutex::init();

00081                 // nothing to do

00084         int32 SharedString::init(char* value)
00085         {
00086                 int32 ret = 0;
00087 
00088                 // initialize parent
00089                 ret = Mutex::init();
00090                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00091                         return FAILURE;
00092 
00093                 // initialize buffers
00094                 if (value)
00095                         return _value.init(value);
00096 
00097                 // initialize with size
00098                 ret = _value.init(30);
00099                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00100                         return FAILURE;
00101 
00102                 // zeroize buffer
00103                 _value.set(0);
00104 
00105                 // ok
00106                 return SUCCESS;
00107         }
00108 
00109         int32 SharedString::init(uint32 size)
00110         {
00111                 int32 ret = 0;
00112 
00113                 // initialize parent
00114                 ret = Mutex::init();
00115                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00116                         return FAILURE;
00117 
00118                 // initialize buffer
00119                 ret = _value.init(size);
00120                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00121                         return FAILURE;
00122 
00123                 // zeroize buffer
00124                 _value.set(0);
00125 
00126                 // ok
00127                 return SUCCESS;
00128         }
00129 }
